item.title: Episode 26: RStudio
item.description: On Episode 26 of Scatter Podcast, I interviewed guest Jonathan Regenstein, Director of Financial Services at RStudio.

item.title: Episode 25: Business Science
item.description: On Episode 25 of Scatter Podcast, I interviewed guest Matt Dancho, CEO and lead Data Science instructor at Business Science University.

item.title: Episode 24: Google & IE
item.description: On Episode 24 of Scatter Podcast, I interviewed Christina Stathopoulos, Analytical Consultant at Google and Adjunct Professor at IE Business School in Madrid.

item.title: Episode 23: Blizzard
item.description: On Episode 23 of Scatter Podcast, I interviewed Hayden Balow, Organizational Development Analyst at Blizzard Entertainment.

item.title: Episode 22: UPenn
item.description: On Episode 22 of Scatter Podcast, I had an engaging interview with Will Chase, Data Scientist at the University of Pennsylvania.

item.title: Episode 21: Zeff
item.description: For Episode 21 of Scatter Podcast, I had a great discussion with Ben Taylor, the Co-Founder and Chief AI Officer at Zeff.

item.title: Episode 20: MaCher
item.description: On Episode 20 of Scatter Podcast, I had a lot of fun hosting industrial designer Ben Denzinger, Product Designer at MaCher.

item.title: Episode 19: Amazon
item.description: On Episode 19 of Scatter Podcast, I discuss data science at Amazon with John Peach, Sr. Data Scientist.

item.title: Episode 18: Saatchi & Saatchi
item.description: For Episode 18 of Scatter Podcast, I interviewed Leondra R. James, Manager of Analytics and Operations at Saatchi + Saatchi.

item.title: Episode 17: ViralGains
item.description: For Episode 17 of Scatter Podcast, I interviewed Justin Fortier, Principal Data Scientist at ViralGains.

item.title: Episode 16: MeridianLink
item.description: For Episode 16 of Scatter Podcast, I had a great time interviewing Ben Lewis, Business Intelligence Analyst at MeridianLink.

item.title: Episode 15: GM
item.description: On Episode 15 of Scatter Podcast, I had the pleasure of interviewing Meltem Ballan, Ph.D., Data Scientist and Architect at General Motors.

item.title: Episode 14: Fehr & Peers
item.description: On Episode 14 of Scatter Podcast, I interview David Wasserman, AICP, Transportation Planner and Data Scientist at Fehr + Peers.

item.title: Episode 13: Method Data Science
item.description: On Episode 13 of Scatter Podcast, I had a great time interviewing Beau Walker, Founder and CEO of Method Data Science.

item.title: Episode 12: TBWA/Chiat/Day
item.description: On Episode 12 of Scatter Podcast, guest Matt Segal, Data Director at TBWA/Chiat/Day, discusses his work at one of the most well-known creative advertising agencies in the world.

item.title: Episode 11: CBRE
item.description: On Episode 11 of Scatter Podcast, Vince Giovannini discusses his work as a Data Scientist at CBRE, a commercial real estate investment company that offers a wide range of real estate consulting services.

item.title: Episode 10: FortyFour
item.description: On Episode 10 of Scatter Podcast, we host guest Ryan Anderson, Director of Performance Marketing and Analytics at FortyFour.

item.title: Episode 9: RealBlocks
item.description: On Episode 9 of Scatter Podcast, we are excited to release this interview with Perrin Quarshie, CEO & Founder of RealBlocks.

item.title: Episode 8: Chegg
item.description: On Episode 8 of Scatter Podcast, guest Taranveer Singh talks about his work as a Data Scientist at Chegg.

item.title: Episode 7: NeoGenomics Laboratories
item.description: On Episode 7 of Scatter Podcast, guest Nicholas Stavrou discusses his work as an Associate Scientist in Computational Biology at NeoGenomics Laboratories, a cancer diagnostic and pharma research company.

item.title: Episode 6: T-Mobile
item.description: For the sixth episode of Scatter Podcast, I am excited to introduce Juan Pablo Murillo, Data Scientist at T-Mobile at their U.S. headquarters in Bellevue, WA.

item.title: Episode 5: Databricks
item.description: New episode of Scatter Podcast is online with Rafi Kurlansik of Databricks.

item.title: Episodes 1-4: Launch!
item.description: Welcome to the official Scatter Podcast launch! Episodes 001-004 are now available featuring an intro and guest interviews from The Home Depot, Pacific Life, and NYC and Company!
